articles.title: Witness Earth's equal day and night: European Space Agency shares equinox photo - Hindustan Times
articles.description: European Space Agency shares a satellite image showcasing the Autumn equinox, marking the division of day and night on Earth's surface.
articles.content:
The European Space Agency (ESA) shared a satellite image on Saturday, showcasing a clear division of day and night on Earth's surface, representing the autumn equinox.
During an equinox, day and nig… [+2241 chars]

articles.description: European Space Agency releases photo of Earth split in day and night
articles.content:
